name: Tetrorb
description:
This game was made for the first #PAJGameJam.

You control a little Orb to make the tetrominos move. 

 

This platform/puzzle game is a twist to the classic Tetris game.

Theme : "Faire du neuf avec du vieux" (FR)

Engine : Unity3D

Design : Watercolor and my scanner

Musics :

- Chino Yoshio – The Way Home

- Chino Yoshio – White Moon

Font : Seaweed Script Font

SFX :

- Water drop

- Single rock hitting wood
